Question.Subject: Lockerz not working but working?
Question.Content:
Ok so lockerz is Not working on firefox but is working on explorer? Whats work?
As in on firefox it says lockerz is down for upgrades but on regular explorer I can log in.
Whats wrong?
Question.ChosenAnswer: maybe you should try using chrome, also make sure to check Lockerz site for any help with that, I know it works in Chrome, but I have never tried in Firefox. I also just hate using IE because it is really slow on my computer compared to any other browser that is on my computer.

Answer.Content: maybe you should try using chrome, also make sure to check Lockerz site for any help with that, I know it works in Chrome, but I have never tried in Firefox. I also just hate using IE because it is really slow on my computer compared to any other browser that is on my computer.
